channel.title: Comments on: Caught In Bloodlust Again…

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: You're welcome! Let me know if you need some words of encouragement! We can always go over one of your games or something. Best of luck to you!
item.content:encoded: You’re welcome! Let me know if you need some words of encouragement! We can always go over one of your games or something. Best of luck to you!

item.title: By: RisingStar
item.dc:creator: RisingStar
item.description: You know, I've been on quite a losing streak myself. But like you said before, celebrate wins, study losses. Thanks a lot!
item.content:encoded: You know, I’ve been on quite a losing streak myself. But like you said before, celebrate wins, study losses. Thanks a lot!

item.title: By: Nate Eagle
item.dc:creator: Nate Eagle
item.description: I'll be sure to mention it at this month's go workshop! He's been an awesome teacher - I'm trying to post more records from our lessons to my website (http://nateeagle.com)./ I dug the Changho book a lot (I think that style is very useful for SDK players to try to emulate), but haven't read the Seigen one, yet.
item.content:encoded: I’ll be sure to mention it at this month’s go workshop! He’s been an awesome teacher – I’m trying to post more records from our lessons to my website (http://nateeagle.com/). I dug the Changho book a lot (I think that style is very useful for SDK players to try to emulate), but haven’t read the Seigen one, yet.

item.title: By: Ruben Berenguel
item.dc:creator: Ruben Berenguel
item.description: Added you as a buddy! And saw you study with Zhou! Could you please tell him I loved his Seigen and Chang'Ho books :D? (and I can recommend the Seigen one to anyone!)
item.content:encoded: Added you as a buddy! And saw you study with Zhou! Could you please tell him I loved his Seigen and Chang’Ho books :D? (and I can recommend the Seigen one to anyone!)

item.title: By: Nate Eagle
item.dc:creator: Nate Eagle
item.description: Love it. Thanks for being willing to get into the details with me - this has been a great conversation. I'd love to play you sometime on KGS, too. My username is cloudbrows.
item.content:encoded: Love it. Thanks for being willing to get into the details with me – this has been a great conversation. I’d love to play you sometime on KGS, too. My username is cloudbrows.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thanks Devin! And what a great idea! I will be sure to add it to the list! Thanks for the suggestion!
item.content:encoded: Thanks Devin! And what a great idea! I will be sure to add it to the list! Thanks for the suggestion!

item.title: By: Devin Flake
item.dc:creator: Devin Flake
item.description: Good article! I suffer from the same problem Ben :) I loved the conversation in the comments - definitely deserves another post about it!
item.content:encoded: Good article! I suffer from the same problem Ben ðŸ™‚ I loved the conversation in the comments – definitely deserves another post about it!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Ah. But you are the one who has distilled it down to a message that I was able to understand and realize. So while the original concept may come from Zhou and Seigen, it is you who deserves the credit for me understanding it. So once again, many thanks. =D
item.content:encoded: Ah. But you are the one who has distilled it down to a message that I was able to understand and realize. So while the original concept may come from Zhou and Seigen, it is you who deserves the credit for me understanding it. So once again, many thanks. =D

item.title: By: Ruben Berenguel
item.dc:creator: Ruben Berenguel
item.description: Don't attribute it to me, all the merit is from Zhou and Seigen ;)
item.content:encoded: Don’t attribute it to me, all the merit is from Zhou and Seigen ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Haha. Thanks for the words of support Todd. I will be sure not to let it get me down too much as I try to get out of my rut. =D I'm looking forward to hearing your comments on the game review! Definitely hope you'll think it was worth all my time and effort. =)
item.content:encoded: Haha. Thanks for the words of support Todd. I will be sure not to let it get me down too much as I try to get out of my rut. =D I’m looking forward to hearing your comments on the game review! Definitely hope you’ll think it was worth all my time and effort. =)
